entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning near midnight and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
